embed.description:
**Chikichi** is a **Companion** that the player can bring along on a run. This card is exclusive to the **Shademancers Tribe**
Players can sacrifice **Chikichi** and the ones they summon to gain increasingly powerful versions with more and more heads. The chain culminates in the five-headed **Chikagaru**.
The stages of **Chikichi** includes the following: **Chikichi** -> **Chikani** -> **Chikasan** -> **Chikashi** -> **Chikagaru**
embed.title: Chikichi
